dict.string: Grant access to the camera at all times while in the workplace to take a picture of the actual user's face to confirm his presence inside the facility.
Grant access to the photos gallery access to update and send profile image

Grant access to your location always, and enabling 'location accuracy' is crucial for verifying your presence in the office, creating optimal routes, and seamlessly running location-related functions in the background, enhancing your overall app experience.

Motion detection is needed to determine more accurate locations when no GPS signal is found or used.
